Vytvorenie tabulky news_templates

CREATE TABLE news_templates ( id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, image_path VARCHAR(255), template_html TEXT, paging_html TEXT, paging_position INT(11) DEFAULT 0, engine VARCHAR(255), domain_id INT(11) DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE news_templates ( id INT IDENTITY(1,1) PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, name NVARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, image_path NVARCHAR(255), template_html NTEXT, paging_html NTEXT, paging_position INT DEFAULT 0, engine NVARCHAR(255), domain_id int DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE news_templates ( id INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, name NVARCHAR2(255) NOT NULL, image_path NVARCHAR2(255), template_html CLOB, paging_html CLOB, paging_position INT DEFAULT 0, engine NVARCHAR2(255), domain_id INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL ); CREATE SEQUENCE S_news_templates START WITH 1; CREATE TRIGGER T_news_templates BEFORE INSERT ON news_templates FOR EACH ROW DECLARE val INTEGER| BEGIN IF :new.id IS NULL THEN SELECT S_news_templates.nextval into val FROM dual| :new.id:= val| END IF| END| ;

CREATE SEQUENCE S_news_templates START WITH 1; CREATE TABLE news_templates ( id INT DEFAULT NEXTVAL('S_news_templates') PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, image_path VARCHAR(255), template_html TEXT, paging_html TEXT, paging_position INT DEFAULT 0, engine VARCHAR(255), domain_id INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL );

Vytvorenie tabulky ai_assistants

CREATE TABLE ai_assistants ( id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, description TEXT, action VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, class_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, field_from VARCHAR(255), field_to VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, provider VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, instructions TEXT NOT NULL, model VARCHAR(255), last_update TIMESTAMP, group_name VARCHAR(255), user_prompt_enabled TINYINT(1) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, user_prompt_label TEXT, icon VARCHAR(255), keep_html TINYINT(1) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, use_streaming TINYINT(1) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, use_temporal TINYINT(1) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, active TINYINT(1) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, domain_id INT(11) DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL ); INSERT INTO ai_assistants (name, description, action, class_name, field_from, field_to, provider, instructions, model, last_update, group_name, user_prompt_enabled, user_prompt_label, icon, keep_html, use_streaming, use_temporal, active, domain_id) VALUES ('AI-01 Prompt Expert', 'components.ai_assistants.description.prompt.expert', 'generate_text', 'sk.iway.iwcm.components.ai.jpa.AssistantDefinitionEntity', '', 'instructions', 'gemini', 'I need you to help me prepare prompts for AI, used OpenAI or Gemini. Prompts will be used within the WebJet CMS system to improve and simplify work. I will write you assignments in turn and you suggest: - a suitable prompt and a model for use in OpenAI and also in Gemini (models may differ) - prompt/instructions try to formulate as a structured text in title: value format - prompt/instructions should include the role, task and possible restrictions - the name of such an assistant (for example, create a clickbait title) in the range of 3-5 words, the title must be concise to make it clear what the given AI assistant for the user will do. --------------------------------------- Example ASSIGNMENT: Based on the text of the page, I need to create a headline that will be the visitor Motivate in clicking on the page name (or pages in the list of articles) YOUR ANSWER: Designed prompt/instructions for both OpenAI and Gemini model in structured format and a suitable and concise name of such an assistant (understandable for the user). Answer only structured format with the object to which you also add the recommended model and name of the provider without explanatory text.', 'gemini-pro-latest', NULL, '10-generate', 1, '', 'radioactive', 0, 0, 0, 1, 1), ('DOC-CW-01 Copywriting and technical communication expert', 'components.ai_assistants.description.copywright.tech-expert', 'generate_text', 'sk.iway.iwcm.doc.DocDetails', 'data', 'data', 'gemini', '"role": "Copywriting and technical communication expert", "task": "Transform the provided technical HTML text (e.g., list of product changes) into engaging, easy-to-understand content for non-technical business users. For each technical point, create a descriptive H2 heading and 1-2 paragraphs (50-100 words total) explaining the change in simple language, avoiding jargon. Structure the output as clean HTML code using H1 for the main title, H2 for section headings, strong for emphasis, and UL/LI for lists if needed.", "constraints": { "language": "Detect language of original text and reply with the same language. Do not change language for response.", "tone": "Professional, friendly, and approachable", "length": "50-100 words per section (1-2 paragraphs)", "avoid": "Technical jargon unless explained in simple terms", "output": "Well-structured HTML with H1, H2, strong, ul/li, and p tags as appropriate", "context": "Base the content strictly on the provided HTML input" }', 'gemini-pro-latest', NULL, '12-copywrite', 0, '', 'writing-sign', 1, 1, 0, 1, 1), ('DOC-CW-01 Copywriting refine', 'components.ai_assistants.description.copywright.refine', 'generate_text', 'sk.iway.iwcm.doc.DocDetails', 'data', 'data', 'gemini', '"role": "Expert web copywriter", "task": "Critically review the provided website content in its original language. Evaluate clarity, conciseness, tone, and messaging alignment with the brand's voice and value proposition. Identify areas for improvement and recommend specific changes to enhance user engagement, conversion, and SEO performance.", "constraints": { "language": "Detect and use the original language of the provided content, do not change language of the text elements", "tone": "Professional, constructive, and actionable", "output_format": "Response in markdown format, in TWO section - first with updated and valid HTML code wrapped in ```html ```` markdown block, second with comments and explanatory of changes. Use same language as content for explanatory of changes.", "focus": "Clarity, conciseness, brand alignment, user engagement, conversion, and SEO best practices", "avoid": "Altering the core meaning of the content or adding unrelated suggestions", "html_structure": "DO NOT change HTML structure, DO NOT add section or other wrapper elements" }', 'gemini-pro-latest', NULL, '12-copywrite', 0, '', 'writing-sign', 1, 1, 0, 1, 1), ('DOC-CW-01 Copywriting refine', 'components.ai_assistants.description.copywright.refine', 'generate_text', 'sk.iway.iwcm.doc.DocDetails', 'data', 'data', 'openai', '"role": "Expert web copywriter", "task": "Critically review the provided website content in its original language. Evaluate clarity, conciseness, tone, and messaging alignment with the brand's voice and value proposition. Identify areas for improvement and recommend specific changes to enhance user engagement, conversion, and SEO performance.", "constraints": { "language": "Detect and use the original language of the provided content, do not change language of the text elements", "tone": "Professional, constructive, and actionable", "output_format": "Response in markdown format, in TWO section - first with updated and valid HTML code wrapped in ```html ```` markdown block, second with comments and explanatory of changes. Use same language as content for explanatory of changes.", "focus": "Clarity, conciseness, brand alignment, user engagement, conversion, and SEO best practices", "avoid": "Altering the core meaning of the content or adding unrelated suggestions", "html_structure": "DO NOT change HTML structure, DO NOT add section or other wrapper elements" }', 'gpt-5', NULL, '12-copywrite', 0, '', 'writing-sign', 1, 1, 0, 1, 1), ('DOC-HTML-01 Web accessibility specialist', 'components.ai_assistants.description.wcag.specialist', 'generate_text', 'sk.iway.iwcm.doc.DocDetails', '', 'data,htmlHead', 'gemini', '"role": "Web accessibility specialist", "task": "Review the provided HTML code for WCAG 2.1 compliance issues, including missing alt attributes, incorrect ARIA usage, missing landmarks, or improper heading hierarchy. Produce corrected HTML code with necessary attributes (e.g., alt text for images, ARIA roles, form labels) to meet WCAG 2.1 Level AA standards. Include brief comments explaining each correction.", "constraints": { "language": "Reply in the same language as the source text", "standard": "WCAG 2.1 Level AA", "alt_text": "Descriptive, concise (up to 100 characters), and contextually relevant", "avoid": "Altering functional code or design unless required for accessibility", "output_format": "Response in markdown format, in TWO section - first with updated and valid HTML code wrapped in ```html ```` markdown block, second with comments and explanatory of changes. Use same language as content for explanatory of changes.", "output_format_example": "```html\n updated HTML code\n``` \n Explanatory of changes in same text language as provided HTML" }', 'gemini-pro-latest', NULL, '10-generate', 0, '', 'disabled-2', 1, 0, 0, 1, 1), ('DOC-HTML-01 Website Builder', 'components.ai_assistants.description.html.website-builder', 'live_chat', 'sk.iway.iwcm.doc.DocDetails', 'data', 'data', 'gemini', '{ "name": "WebJET PageBuilder — Bootstrap 5 HTML Generator", "version": "1.0", "purpose": "Convert the following user request to a clean HTML snippet suitable for WebJET CMS PageBuilder. HTML must be built exclusively on Bootstrap 5 grid system and components. Prompts will be used within the WebJet CMS system to improve and simplify work. I will write you assignments in turn and you suggest: - a suitable prompt and a model for use in OpenAI and also in Gemini (models may differ) - prompt/instructions try to formulate as a structured text in title: value format - prompt/instructions should include the role, task and possible restrictions - the name of such an assistant (for example, create a clickbait title) in the range of 3-5 words, the title must be concise to make it clear what the given AI assistant for the user will do. --------------------------------------- Example ASSIGNMENT: Based on the text of the page, I need to create a headline that will be the visitor Motivate in clicking on the page name (or pages in the list of articles) YOUR ANSWER: Designed prompt/instructions for both OpenAI and Gemini model in structured format and a suitable and concise name of such an assistant (understandable for the user). Answer only structured format with the object to which you also add the recommended model and name of the provider without explanatory text.', 'gemini-pro-latest', NULL, '10-generate', true, '', 'radioactive', false, false, false, true, 1), ('DOC-CW-01 Copywriting and technical communication expert', 'components.ai_assistants.description.copywright.tech-expert', 'generate_text', 'sk.iway.iwcm.doc.DocDetails', 'data', 'data', 'gemini', '"role": "Copywriting and technical communication expert", "task": "Transform the provided technical HTML text (e.g., list of product changes) into engaging, easy-to-understand content for non-technical business users. CREATE TABLE ai_stats ( id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, assistant_id INT NOT NULL, created DATETIME NOT NULL, used_tokens INT NOT NULL, user_id INT NOT NULL, domain_id INT(11) DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE ai_stats ( id INT IDENTITY(1,1) PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, assistant_id INT NOT NULL, created DATETIME NOT NULL, used_tokens INT NOT NULL, user_id INT NOT NULL, domain_id int DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE ai_stats ( id INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, assistant_id INTEGER NOT NULL, created DATE NOT NULL, used_tokens INTEGER NOT NULL, user_id INTEGER NOT NULL, domain_id INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL ); CREATE SEQUENCE S_ai_stats START WITH 1; CREATE TRIGGER T_ai_stats BEFORE INSERT ON ai_stats FOR EACH ROW DECLARE val INTEGER| BEGIN IF :new.id IS NULL THEN SELECT S_ai_stats.nextval into val FROM dual| :new.id:= val| END IF| END| ;
